ISSUE.TITLE: virtual machines - status list - new "Paused" or "Suspended" option
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### NetBox version v4.2.1 ### Feature type Change to existing functionality ### Triage priority N/A ### Proposed functionality add "Paused" or "Suspended" to list of default vm status's ### Use case most Virtualisation solutions allow vm's to be paused or suspended. The default list of status fields for vm's should be extended to allow for documenting this (I know the list can be extended by modifying configuration files, but it feels like this should be part of the default list) ### Database changes _No response_ ### External dependencies _No response_

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fixes: #18408 add STATUS_PAUSED to VirtualMachine (#18595) * feat(vm): add extra status * keep only usefull status --------- Co-authored-by: Antoine Keranflec'h <antoine.keranflech@worldline.com>
Fixes: #18408 add STATUS_PAUSED to VirtualMachine (#18595) * feat(vm): add extra status * keep only usefull status --------- Co-authored-by: Antoine Keranflec'h <antoine.keranflech@worldline.com>
